verses.roman:
sei kuṇḍe yei eka-bāra kare snāna
tāṅre rādhā-sama 'prema' kṛṣṇa kare dāna

synonyms: sei kuṇḍe—in that lake; yei—anyone who; eka-bāra—once; kare snāna—takes a bath; tāṅre—unto him; rādhā-sama—like Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; prema—ecstatic love; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; kare dāna—gives as charity.
translation: "Indeed, Lord Kṛṣṇa gives ecstatic love like that of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī to whoever bathes in that lake even once in his life.
